q: How to copy SVG code of a layer?

Pre-made files with UI kits (iOS, Material) to start projects

q: Background Color of Artboard: 'Include in Export'?

q: Difference between Slice and Make Exportable?
o: Slice defines a region (can include multiple layers); Make Exportable is attached to a specific layer/group

q: Layer List: How to prevent selecting a group/layer accidentally?
o: Lock it (Cmd+Shift+L) or Option-Click to select through

q: Layer List: Shortcut to select a deeply nested layer directly?
o: Cmd + Click on the layer in the canvas (Deep Select)

q: How to search specifically for a layer by name?
o: Use the Filter input field at the bottom of the Layer List sidebar
Slices, Exportable Layers, Hidden Layers, Locked Layers (Toggle icons)

q: Does Sketch have a native 'Save for Web' legacy dialog?
o: No, export through 'Make Exportable' inspector panel

q: How to Invert colors of a bitmap image in Sketch?
o: Select image > Inspector > Color Adjust > Invert checkbox (Non-destructive)

q: How to crop a Bitmap image non-destructively?
o: Double click image to edit > Drag selection box > Click 'Crop' (or 'Invert' selection then Crop)

q: Can you use a Magic Wand tool in Sketch?
o: It existed in very old versions, but generally removed/hidden; use Masking instead

q: Vector Tool (V): How to draw straight lines?
o: Click once for each point (don't drag)

q: Vector Tool (V): How to draw curved lines?
o: Click and Drag to pull out bezier handles

q: Vector Tool (V): How to close a path?
o: Click back on the very first point of the path

q: Vector Tool (V): How to stop drawing an open path?

o: Has no bezier handles, creates sharp corner
Handles move symmetrically (same angle and length)
Handles move at same angle but can have different lengths
Handles are completely independent (create cusps/sharp turns in curves)

q: How to put Text on a Path?
o: Text > Text on Path (Requires selecting both text and a vector path)
Opening a document that uses fonts not installed on your system
Swapping a missing font with an installed one globally for the document

o: Select the instance, use the Overrides dropdown in Inspector to choose another symbol

q: What is the purpose of 'Resizing Constraints' on a group?
o: Controls how layers inside the group behave when the group is resized (e.g., stretch, pin to corner)

q: Data: Linking a text layer to a 'Names' data source?
o: Populates the text layer with a random name from the data source

q: How to create a custom Data Source?
o: Add a folder of images or a text file to Sketch Preferences > Data
Keeps a layer (like a header) in the same position on screen while the rest of the content scrolls

q: Prototyping: maintain scroll position after click?
o: Check 'Maintain scroll position after click' in the Link properties (good for tab switching)

q: Masking: What shape defines the mask area?
o: The bottom-most layer in the selection becomes the mask for layers above it

o: Layer > Combine > Union (if vectors) or flattening is usually destructive to bitmap unless using boolean ops
